settings.heading: PRODUCT DETAILS
settings.content:
An elevated loungewear essential. The Core Straight Leg Sweatpant is made of a 12 oz cotton with a wide-leg, baggy silhouette. Includes a drawstring waistband, side pockets, and back pocket for added functionally.

  • 100% ORGANIC COTTON
  • 12 OZ BRUSHED TERRY
  • STANDARD FIT
  • MID RISE
  • GARMENT WASHED
  • INSPIRED BY VINTAGE GARMENTS

settings.heading: SIZE & FIT
settings.content:
*We recommend to order your true size for a baggier fit*

  • XS: Waist relaxed 26" x Inseam 30 1/2"
  • S: Waist relaxed 28" x Inseam 31"
  • M: Waist relaxed 30" x Inseam 31 1/2"
  • L: Waist relaxed 32" x Inseam 32"
  • XL: Waist relaxed 34" x Inseam 32 1/2"
  • XXL: Waist relaxed 36" x Inseam 33"

Male model is 6'1 and is wearing a size Medium.

Female model is 5'6 and is wearing a size Small.

settings.heading: FREE DELIVERY & EASY RETURNS
settings.content:
Shipping:

  • FREE U.S. SHIPPING OVER $100 & EASY RETURNS

Returns:

  • We gladly accept returns within 30 days of purchase. Refunds are issued to the original form of payment or as store credit. Orders placed with store credit can only be refunded in store credit. Orders placed with store credit can only be refunded in store credit.
  • Orders placed between November 21 and December 26, 2024, will enjoy an extended 60-day return window for the holiday season.
  • Please note that returned merchandise must be unworn, undamaged, unwashed, and have the original tags still intact. Vintage pieces and ‘last chance’ items are final and cannot be returned or exchanged.
  • If your item is damaged and your purchase date falls outside our standard return window, then please contact SERVICE@ELWOODCLOTHING.COM and we’ll be happy to serve you. We are not responsible for lost orders with the incorrect address. Once your order is placed it cannot be modified.
